## ReadableSeisFluid.getSAIBalance() method

Get the amount of SAI held by an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSAIBalance(address?: string, overrides?: SeisCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
|  overrides | [SeisCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
